channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Honduras Avant Qu?ils Ne Partent
channel.desc: Le Honduras est l'un des pays les plus pauvres d'Am?rique centrale et l'un des endroits les plus violents au monde. La combinaison de la pauvret? et de l'attrait du profit dans le commerce omnipr?sent de la drogue a fait de nombreuses victimes. ? ce jour, le gouvernement n'a pas ?t? en mesure de r?duire la pauvret? ou d'endiguer le trafic de drogue et la violence des gangs qui en r?sulte. L'?glise catholique est l'une des rares institutions du pays ? offrir des soins et des alternatives sociales aux jeunes familles. Ce film examine certains des d?fis ainsi que les programmes g?r?s par l'?glise. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Every Wednesday night, Fr. Mitch Pacwa, interviews various guests seeking to teach and prepare us for evangelism. Learn more about your faith and reawaken your desire to bring others to the Church. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord look at the fascinating life of Blessed Anna Maria Taigi, a wife and mother who was called to abandon worldly desires and follow Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Debbie Cowden and her expert panelists advise parents on how to discuss sexuality with their children, in a way that is accordance with Church teaching and God?s plan for humanity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Father Mitch Pacwa gives short meditations on each of the Five Mysteries of Light introduced by Pope John Paul II. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Blessed Sacrament
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite a litany in honor of the Most Blessed Sacrament from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Good Or Evil: Who Decides?
channel.desc: Apologist and author Dr. Raymond De Souza explains the importance of having a well-informed conscience in order to live a moral Christian life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Revelation: The Second Coming
channel.desc: HISTORICAL BACKGROUND OF BOOK OF REVELATION. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Images Of Mary
channel.desc: Fr. McBride briefly sums up all he has spoken about Mary's different aspects and roles. Mary is the Mother of God, the Church, and all of us. We can count on her to help us, to guide us, and pray with us to her son. She gives herself for her Son and us so that we can be in heaven and be good on earth. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: JonMarc Grodi and his guests address the personal obstacles, doctrinal objections, and the irresistible attraction to the Church Jesus founded 2,000 years ago. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Examining the Luminous Mysteries, Fr. Dwight Logenecker illustrates how each Hail Mary of the Rosary takes us deeper into the mysteries of Christ?s life, offering new graces. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Heart Of Jesus In History
channel.desc: Explore the history of Devotion to the Heart of Jesus, highlighting the lives of the two saints most associated with spreading it: St. Margaret Mary Alacoque and St. Claude la Colombiere. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Papal Audience With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: From the Vatican, Pope Leo XIV delivers his weekly address to the faithful. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fathers For Good
channel.desc: Fr. Francis Gustilo and Frank Padilla discuss the call of men to Christian maturity. This maturation is the key to becoming a good father, spouse and member of society. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Discussing the story of the rich man and the dishonest overseer, Father Leo Clifford develops the theme that we need to treat others as we ourselves wish to be treated. If we request mercy and forgiveness, we should give the same to others. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Debbie Cowden and her expert panelists advise parents on how to discuss sexuality with their children, in a way that is accordance with Church teaching and God?s plan for humanity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Of Europe
channel.desc: Fr. Bernard McGuckian, SJ travels to Paray-le-Monial, France to explore the life of St. Margaret Mary Alacoque. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Adventure Catechism
channel.desc: From an early age, children learn their prayers by heart. But prayer also invites us into a relationship with God. Jesus taught the Disciples how to pray the Our Father, which embodies His will for His children. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Lukas Storyteller
channel.desc: The fair reaches the reef and everyone must earn their ticket. When Peter gets in trouble, his friends learn an important lesson about always telling the truth, as they follow the example of Saint Anthony of Padua. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary For Kids
channel.desc: The Little Angel leads kids through the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary from Jesus' first Miracle at Cana to the Institution of the Eucharist at the Last Supper. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug Keck discuss how sin affects priests and the consecration. They also answer viewer questions about the faith and the concept of a ?fine-tuned universe.?. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, reveals how the Holy Spirit allows Catholics to understand and come to know Christ even better. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Every Wednesday night, Fr. Mitch Pacwa, interviews various guests seeking to teach and prepare us for evangelism. Learn more about your faith and reawaken your desire to bring others to the Church. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Baptism of Christ, Wedding at Cana, Proclamation of the Kingdom, Transfiguration and Institution of the Eucharist help us to receive the graces of salvation from Christ through Mary's intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grab Your Catechism With Fr. Connor
channel.desc: Fr. Connor shares the history and purpose of the Catechism of the Catholic Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life and spirituality of St. Angela of the Cross, foundress of the Sisters of the Cross. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Philosophers' Bench
channel.desc: Dr. Kreeft and Dr. Howard examine what it means to be truly free, and how the rules of the moral order serve as guidelines that lead to true happiness. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Families share their experiences in learning to hear God's voice and know His will. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Every Wednesday night, Fr. Mitch Pacwa, interviews various guests seeking to teach and prepare us for evangelism. Learn more about your faith and reawaken your desire to bring others to the Church. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Alive In Christ The Martyrs Of The Church
channel.desc: When the Eucharist is shown through the eyes of Ignatius of Antioch and Justin Marty, the true meaning is illuminated as they both willingly sacrifice their lives for their Faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Brian Butler joins Fr. Mark to share the mission of the ECHO Community, which cultivates authentic masculinity and femininity through the lens of the Theology of the Body. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug Keck discuss how sin affects priests and the consecration. They also answer viewer questions about the faith and the concept of a ?fine-tuned universe.?. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Honduras Texiguat, Une Communaute Oubliee
channel.desc: Enclav? dans l'une des r?gions les plus pauvres du Honduras, Texiguat est un petit village o? le travail pastoral de l'?glise apporte l'espoir aux enfants, aux femmes et aux hommes. Dans une r?gion o? les services sociaux et les ressources sont si limit?s, le travail caritatif de l'?glise catholique devient essentiel pour la survie de certains des membres les plus vuln?rables de la soci?t?. Ce film pr?sente le service affectueux du P?re Jos? ?lvarez et une poign?e de religieuses, qui consacrent leur vie ? aimer et ? servir leurs fr?res et s?urs. L'?ducation et une assistance m?dicale modeste font partie des services de l'?glise, mais c'est surtout la pr?dication de l'?vangile qui fait la diff?rence dans la vie du peuple hondurien de cette r?gion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Sister Marie De Mandat Grancey
channel.desc: The fascinating story of Sister Marie de Mandat-Grancey. Follow her extraordinary efforts to locate the house of Mary, the Mother of Jesus, as she travels to Ephesus, Turkey to bring this treasure to the Catholic Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about papal infallibility, the effectiveness of prayers said for non-believers, and whether the Catholic Church may be considered WOKE. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Total Consecration To Jesus Through Mary
channel.desc: Fr. Melvin and Fr. Brian Dinkel, IVE, discuss original sin; a Marian devotee shares her testimony about her return to her faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother welcomes Ted and Iris Bjorn, who participated in the Retrouvaille Program, a Church-sponsored program for couples in a troubled marriage. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Dwight Logenecker shares more about his dynamic book that takes us through the 20 mysteries of the Rosary, revealing the incredible gifts found in the Sorrowful Mysteries. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Great Britain On Location
channel.desc: James McCullough speaks to Fiorella Nash, with the Society for the Protection of Unborn Children, about her pro-life work and her book on radical feminism. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! In Concert An Evening In Barcelona
channel.desc: From the Basilica of the Sagrada Familia in Barcelona, Spain, the Berlin Philharmonic Orchestra provides an outstanding performance, hosted by Dr. Jacqueline Leary-Warsaw. (90 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: The breathtaking monastery at Monte Cassino is the site for this exploration of St. Benedict of Nursia, creator of the Benedictine Rule and inspiration for the St. Benedict Medal. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Alive In Christ The Martyrs Of The Church
channel.desc: When the Eucharist is shown through the eyes of Ignatius of Antioch and Justin Marty, the true meaning is illuminated as they both willingly sacrifice their lives for their Faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Global Divine Mercy Chaplet
channel.desc: Children from around the world pray the Chaplet of Divine Mercy. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Way Of The Cross For Kids
channel.desc: Christine, Eva, Joseph and Enrique follow the 14 Stations of the Passion and Death of Our Lord Jesus Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch discusses one of the most influential Old Testament books in the history of the Church, Isaiah, noting Saint Jerome?s famous line that references this important book. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: In Liberia, a country founded as a refuge for freed slaves, the Catholic Church supports healing through education, healthcare and faith initiatives despite many challenges. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the Examen, a teaching of St. Ignatius of Loyola on daily prayer. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Our Father's Plan
channel.desc: Dr. Scott Hahn and Jeff Cavins explain how to read the Bible in chronological order while discussing what the Bible says. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Former MLB pitcher Bobby Keppel discusses his experience playing in the Japanese circuit, and how he believes sports can be used as a tool for evangelization. Hosted by Bob Dolan. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Grace and Chance, two young volunteers for a Supportive Needs Pilgrimage in Lourdes, express their previous expectations of the pilgrimage, and how they changed during the trip. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Samantha Stephenson is back to share more about her book and the immense need for a cultural revival on issues of motherhood due to the threat of emerging biotechnologies. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina present some insightful ways of defending the Faith in an increasingly unreasonable age. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the Examen, a teaching of St. Ignatius of Loyola on daily prayer. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn On Location
channel.desc: From the Annual EWTN Radio Conference, Dr. Matthew Bunson gives powerful insight into the evangelization power of the popes, and the importance to persevere in God?s calling. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Our Lady Of The Pillar
channel.desc: Ordinary life is the perfect place for extraordinary things to happen, as seen in this inspiring story of the Blessed Mother?s intercessory prayers for James the Apostle, and for a college student diagnosed with cancer. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Total Consecration To Jesus Through Mary
channel.desc: Fr. Melvin and Fr. Thomas Steinke, IVE, discuss Mary and the protoevangelium; a Marian devotee testifies to the power of total consecration in her battle against cancer. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug Keck discuss how sin affects priests and the consecration. They also answer viewer questions about the faith and the concept of a ?fine-tuned universe.?. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Dwight Logenecker reviews the restorative and renewing graces we?ve found so far in the Rosary, concluding his discussion with a look at the glories of the Glorious Mysteries. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Saint Luke The Evangelist
channel.desc: Explore the life and Gospel of Saint Luke the Evangelist, featuring commentary from notable Biblical scholars, visits to sites holding relics, and icons attributed to Saint Luke. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints And Heroes
channel.desc: An amazing story of the Jesuit missionary St. Francis Xavier as he tries to win souls for Christ in Japan. Animated. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: Things go wrong at the Donut Shop when everyone is late to work, but Fr. Joe gets them back on track with a reminder to start all things with prayer and a lesson from the Massterpiece Machine. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother shares the story of Zacchaeus' encounter with Jesus, an example showing how some people may have a lot of knowledge but very little in knowing God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Liberating A Continent John Paul Ii And The Fall Of Communism
channel.desc: A documentary on St. John Paul II's role in the collapse of communism and the liberation of Central and Eastern Europe. (90 minutes).
